DOC.detailed_description: This Phase II , multicenter , prospective , open label , single arm study . The primary endpoint study progression-free rate define Response Evaluation Criteria Solid Tumors ( RECIST ) guideline version 1.1 week 12 start treatment . The secondary endpoint include overall progression-free survival ( PFS ) , response rate ( RR ) , duration response , overall survival ( OS ) , toxicity assessment report adverse event .
